articles.title: Argentina's lithium pipeline promises 'white gold' boom as Chile tightens control
articles.description: In Argentina's mountainous north, a strong pipeline of lithium projects close to coming online looks set to unlock a wave of production that could see its output of the key electric vehicle battery metal as much as triple within the next two years.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, April 24 (Reuters) - In Argentina's mountainous north, a strong pipeline of lithium projects close to coming online looks set to unlock a wave of production that could see its output of the key electric vehicle battery metal as much as ... [4162 chars]

articles.title: Aerolineas Argentina Receives Its 1st Boeing 737-800BCF
articles.description: The airline has signed an agreement with Mirgor which will require substantial aircraft use.
articles.content: Aerolíneas Argentinas (AR) recently celebrated LV-CTC, a converted Boeing 737-800BCF freighter, in a ceremony at Buenos Aires Ministro Pistarini International Airport (EZE) that included Pablo Ceriani, President of Aerolíneas Argentinas and Diego Giu... [2850 chars]

articles.title: Brighton CEO addresses Alexis Mac Allister transfer rumours as Manchester United and Liverpool circle
articles.description: Brighton CEO Paul Barber has opened up over the transfer speculation over Alexis Mac Allister.The Argentina international looks set to leave Brighton
articles.content:
Brighton CEO Paul Barber has opened up on the transfer speculation surrounding Alexis Mac Allister.
The Argentina international looks set to leave the Seagulls this summer as interest in his services heightens.

articles.title: Pope Francis plans to visit his native Argentina in 2024, local media reports
articles.description: Pope Francis, who has not visited his home country Argentina since he left for the Vatican a decade ago, said he planned to visit in 2024, local media reported on Sunday.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, April 23 (Reuters) - Pope Francis, who has not visited his home country Argentina since he left for the Vatican a decade ago, said he planned to visit in 2024, local media reported on Sunday.
"I always wanted to return," Francis told Ar... [718 chars]

articles.title: Platino Awards Winners: ‘Argentina, 1985’ Sweep Top Film Honors
articles.description: Santiago Miter’s film took home six gongs, including Best Ibero-American Fiction film.
articles.content:
Santiago Miter’s political thriller Argentina, 1985, and the Colombian series News of a Kidnapping, created by Andrés Wood and Rodrigo García, swept the top awards at the tenth Platino Awards Saturday evening.
Miter’s film took home six gongs, includ... [2904 chars]

articles.title: April’s best new translated fiction
articles.description: Including new works in translation from Argentina, France, Sweden, Iraq, Thailand, and Rwanda
articles.content:
Cousins
Cousins, by Aurora Venturini
In 2007, at the age of 85, Aurora Venturini won a prestigious Argentinian newspaper award for her novel Cousins (Faber, £12.99) – a dark, gnomic, slapstick series of tales about a poor family living near Buenos Ai... [7650 chars]

articles.title: Pro-car, pro-meat and anti-woke: why a proper rural political party could go far
articles.description: People here always love to claim as “one of our own” anyone with a bit of Irish ancestry who has made a name for themselves overseas. It doesn’t have to be an American president like Joe Biden, it can be a sports star like Alexis Mac Allister, who last year helped Argentina win the World Cup.
articles.content: People here always love to claim as “one of our own” anyone with a bit of Irish ancestry who has made a name for themselves overseas. It doesn’t have to be an American president like Joe Biden, it can be a sports star like Alexis Mac Allister, who la... [5809 chars]

articles.description: Benicio del Toro receives a standing ovation as he accepts an Honorary Platino.
